Recommendations: The thesis is accepted for the award of a Ph.D. degree.
The thesis is acceptable subject to clarification of certain points during the viva-voce examination.
The thesis is acceptable subject to modification/clarification/revision. After modification, the thesis should NOT be referred back to me.
The thesis is acceptable subject to further work/modification/substantial revision of the text. After modification, the thesis should be referred back to me for final assessment.
The thesis does not meet the standards of comparable works in institutions of higher learning and is therefore rejected.
